title: Stones River National Battlefield: Research
body: Research       Researchers and authors may access the park's museum, archives and library collections by appointment only. You should submit a written request at least two weeks prior to your proposed research date in order to allow us time to schedule a staff member to assist you.Use the links below to download our Access and Use polcies and a Researcher Registration Form.Access and Use PolicyCopyright and Privacy RestrictionsResearcher Registration Form
